statements: DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis = 'Cough';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND patient_id = 200
DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM TreatmentRecords WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM lab_results WHERE patient_id = 123 AND result_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Labs WHERE lab_name = 'Lab A' AND test_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE dosage >= 100 AND frequency = 'daily';
